metadata.description: Production-tested skills for Claude Code - Cloudflare, AI, React, Tailwind v4, and modern web development

plugins.name: cloudflare-skills
plugins.description: Complete Cloudflare platform skills - Workers, D1, R2, KV, AI, Queues, Durable Objects, and more. 16 production-tested skills for edge computing.

plugins.name: ai-skills
plugins.description: AI and LLM integration skills - Vercel AI SDK, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Claude API, ElevenLabs. 14 skills for building AI applications.

plugins.name: frontend-skills
plugins.description: Frontend and UI skills - Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, TanStack suite, animations, and React Native. 13 skills for modern web and mobile UIs.

plugins.name: auth-skills
plugins.description: Authentication skills - Clerk and Better Auth integrations for user management and security.

plugins.name: cms-skills
plugins.description: Content management skills - TinaCMS, Sveltia CMS, and WordPress plugin development.

plugins.name: database-skills
plugins.description: Database and storage skills - Drizzle ORM, Neon Postgres, Vercel KV, and Vercel Blob.

plugins.name: backend-skills
plugins.description: Backend framework skills - FastAPI and Flask for Python web services.

plugins.name: tooling-skills
plugins.description: Development tooling skills - MCP servers, project planning, session management, workflow automation, and skill development.
